quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
author: Anonymous

quote: I’m on a seafood diet. I see food and I eat it.
author: Anonymous

quote: My bed is a magical place where I suddenly remember everything I forgot to do.
author: Anonymous

quote: I'm not lazy, I'm on energy-saving mode.
author: Anonymous

quote: I used to think I was indecisive, but now I'm not too sure.
author: Anonymous

quote: Life is short. Smile while you still have teeth.
author: Anonymous

quote: If you think nobody cares if you're alive, try missing a couple of payments.
author: Earl Wilson

quote: Some people graduate with honors, I am just honored to graduate.
author: Mr. Bean

quote: My wallet is like an onion. Opening it makes me cry.
author: Anonymous

quote: Common sense is like deodorant. The people who need it most never use it.
author: Anonymous

quote: Why do they allow ‘silent’ and ‘listen’ to have the same letters? Suspicious.
author: Anonymous

quote: My favorite exercise is a cross between a lunge and a crunch. I call it lunch.
author: Anonymous

quote: I followed my heart… it led me to the fridge.
author: Anonymous

quote: Don’t worry if plan A doesn’t work out. There are 25 more letters.
author: Anonymous

quote: If we’re not meant to have midnight snacks, why is there a light in the fridge?
author: Anonymous

quote: I'm not great at the advice. Can I interest you in a sarcastic comment?
author: Chandler Bing

quote: If you can’t remember my name, just say ‘donuts’ and I’ll turn around.
author: Anonymous

quote: The early bird can have the worm. I’ll sleep in and have pancakes.
author: Anonymous

quote: If at first you don’t succeed, then skydiving definitely isn’t for you.
author: Steven Wright

quote: A balanced diet means a cupcake in each hand.
author: Anonymous

quote: The best way to teach your kids about taxes is by eating 30% of their ice cream.
author: Bill Murray

quote: I dream of a better world where chickens can cross the road without being questioned.
author: Anonymous

quote: If life gives you melons, you might be dyslexic.
author: Anonymous

quote: I'm not short, I'm concentrated awesome.
author: Anonymous

quote: I could agree with you, but then we’d both be wrong.
author: Russell Lynes

quote: Never trust math. It’s always plotting something.
author: Anonymous

quote: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.
author: Winnie the Pooh

quote: I’m on a 30-day diet. So far, I’ve lost 15 days.
author: Anonymous

quote: Why fall in love when you can fall asleep?
author: Anonymous

quote: Some people just have a way with words, and other people… oh… not have way.
author: Steve Martin

quote: I'm multitasking: I can listen, ignore and forget at the same time.
author: Anonymous

quote: It’s okay if you don’t like me. Not everyone has good taste.
author: Anonymous

quote: Some minds are like concrete—thoroughly mixed up and permanently set.
author: Anonymous

quote: I don’t need a hair stylist, my pillow gives me a new hairstyle every morning.
author: Anonymous

quote: I'm reading a book on anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down!
author: Anonymous

quote: Don’t give up on your dreams so soon… Sleep longer.
author: Anonymous

quote: When nothing goes right, go left.
author: Anonymous

quote: Some people graduate with honors, I am just honored to graduate.
author: Mr. Bean

quote: Monday is proof that we survived the weekend.
author: Anonymous

quote: My life feels like a test I didn’t study for.
author: Anonymous

quote: If I were a superhero, my power would be napping anywhere, anytime.
author: Anonymous

quote: I tried to be normal once. Worst two minutes ever.
author: Anonymous

quote: My brain has too many tabs open.
author: Anonymous

quote: Dear Math, I’m not a therapist. Solve your own problems.
author: Anonymous

quote: Sometimes I shock myself with the smart stuff I say. Other times, I try to get out of the car with the seatbelt on.
author: Anonymous

quote: Sarcasm: because beating people up is illegal.
author: Anonymous

quote: Taking naps sounds childish. I prefer to call them ‘horizontal life pauses’.
author: Anonymous

quote: I’m not weird. I’m a limited edition.
author: Anonymous
